column5: Enjoy a stay in a cozy bedroom with one twin bed in our vintage style house in one of the most affluent and safest neighborhood in Texas. Shops, restaurants, train station, Bush Presidential Library, Meadows Museum, SMU campus are all in walking distance. Both uptown area and north park mall are within 10 min driving distance. There is a running track across the street and one about 1/2 mile away on the SMU campus.
